title: ORION Council Validation
description: Validation result from AI Council for a Brain decision. Council validates decisions but never modifies or proposes alternatives.

validation_id.description: Unique identifier for this validation result

decision_id.description: ID of the decision that was validated

result.description: Validation result: APPROVED allows decision to proceed, BLOCKED changes decision to NO_ACTION

confidence.description: Confidence-weighted score from all validators (0.0 to 1.0)

critique.description: Combined critique from all validators explaining the validation result

validators_used.description: List of validators that contributed to this result

timestamp.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when validation was completed

source.description: Must be orion-council (only council emits validations)

escalated_to_admin.description: Whether this validation was escalated to admin for review

safety_veto_triggered.description: Whether safety veto was triggered by a high-confidence concern
